com.facebook.litho.widget

Class EditText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ComponentLifecycle
      • com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher

    public final class EditText
extends ComponentLifecycle
    Component that renders an EditText.

    • Optional Props

        • text

          Text to display.
          Type:
          java.lang.CharSequence

        • hint

          Hint text to display.
          Type:
          java.lang.CharSequence

        • ellipsize

          If sets, specifies the position of the text to be ellispized.
          Type:
          android.text.TextUtils.TruncateAt

        • minLines

          Minimum number of lines to show.
          Type:
          int

        • maxLines

          Maximum number of lines to show.
          Type:
          int

        • maxLength

          Specifies the maximum number of characters to accept.
          Type:
          int

        • shadowRadius

          Blur radius of the shadow.
          Type:
          float

        • shadowDx

          Horizontal offset of the shadow.
          Type:
          float

        • shadowDy

          Vertical offset of the shadow.
          Type:
          float

        • shadowColor

          Color for the shadow underneath the text.
          Type:
          int

        • isSingleLine

          If set, makes the text to be rendered in a single line.
          Type:
          boolean

        • textColor

          Color of the text.
          Type:
          int

        • textColorStateList

          ColorStateList of the text.
          Type:
          android.content.res.ColorStateList

        • hintColor

          Type:
          int

        • hintColorStateList

          Type:
          android.content.res.ColorStateList

        • linkColor

          Type:
          int

        • highlightColor

          Type:
          int

        • textSize

          Size of the text.
          Type:
          int

        • extraSpacing

          Extra spacing between the lines of text.
          Type:
          float

        • spacingMultiplier

          Extra spacing between the lines of text, as a multiplier.
          Type:
          float

        • textStyle

          Style (bold, italic, bolditalic) for the text.
          Type:
          int

        • typeface

          Typeface for the text.
          Type:
          android.graphics.Typeface

        • textAlignment

          Alignment of the text within its container.
          Type:
          android.text.Layout.Alignment

        • gravity

          Gravity for the text within its container.
          Type:
          int

        • editable

          If set, allows the text to be editable.
          Type:
          boolean

        • selection

          Moves the cursor to the selection index.
          Type:
          int

        • inputType

          Type of data being placed in a text field, used to help an input method decide how to let the user enter text.
          Type:
          int
